name: BURGER STACK
description:
BURGER STACK
- created by ZEN in 48hrs for GMTK Jam 2021 -

Rate here = https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2021/rate/1080786

DESCRIPTION:
'Join together' tasty ingredients to create high scoring burgers. But be careful not to fill up the grid. Try to get the highest score you can, good luck.

CONTROLS:
PLACE - (Left Mouse Button)
SPIN - (Right Mouse Button)

RULES:
1. Ingredients cannot be placed on occupied tiles
2. When ingredient placed, it checks all the adjacent tiles
3. If all the adjacent tiles are empty or all the tiles already have the current ingredient, it will create a new burger. Otherwise,  the current ingredient will join on top of all adjacent burgers that don't already have the current ingredient
4. Placing a 'TOP BUN' will free up the tile

SCORING:
10pts- placing an ingredient
10pts x split amount- splitting an ingredient

finished burger (has top and bottom bun)
50pts - 1 Ingredient
60pts - 2 Ingredients
70pts - 3 Ingredients
80pts - 4 Ingredients
100pts - 5 Ingredients
200pts - 6 Ingredients
300pts - 7 Ingredients (MAX)

- thanks for playing : ) -
